description:
Note: This content is also included in the "Special Swimsuit Costume Set for 16 Playable Characters" that is available as a separate purchase. Be careful to avoid making a redundant purchase.

Special Laxus Costume: Special Swimsuit is added.

Note: Costumes can be changed from the "Dresser" at "Lucy's House" after advancing the game to a certain point.
name: Laxus's Costume "Special Swimsuit"
